text:
Here's a picture worth a few thousand words, via Dr. @SDrydenPeterson. The bars show #COVIDVaccination divided by #COVID19 cases. The colors show ⬆️ risk b/c #equity factors. The hardest hit, highest risk communities are on the right, in red, w/ lowest #vaccine ratio.
#MApoli 1/2 https://t.co/7BEhU8iJL8
